content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/rsp4j is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. The repository is located at `/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/rsp4j`.

Let me start by examining the project structure and the pom.xml file to understand the current setup.

My approach will be:
1. First, view the project structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the pom.xml file to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17 in the pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if it works
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Continue until `mvn clean verify` succeeds

Let's start!

                <version>1.7.25</version>

            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>

                    <target>1.8</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
